abstract: A few weeks ago, I pointed to data from MasterCard SpendingPulse that showed a sharp fall-off in gasoline purchases. Then after the Memorial Day weekend, I saw more evidence of price-induced conservation.
lead_paragraph: A few weeks ago, I pointed to data from MasterCard SpendingPulse that showed a sharp fall-off in gasoline purchases. Then after the Memorial Day weekend, I saw more evidence of price-induced conservation.
